name: Echoes of Eternity (Chucklebean)
description:
LTU Game Jam 2022 - Shift of Sentiment

Game Name - Echoes of Eternity

Created by: Charles Hughes, Christofer Kumor

Echoes of Eternity is a point-and-click searching game. 

You play as a person throughout their childhood life who is ready to leave the house and start your next chapter.

However, before you embark on your journey, you take a bit of time to reminice the memories you made in your childhood room.

The game consists of four stages, each stage represents your room at a particular point in your life.

In each room, there are objects that contain clues. Using the mouse cursor and the left mouse click button, search and uncover to clues to rediscover old memories.

When all the clues have been found (3 per room), you will be transported to the next consecutive room until you reach the end.

Reminiscing and remembering life is full of good and bad moments, so appreciate them all since they contributed to who you are today!


*NOTE*

When you find a clue, please wait for the dialogue text to disappear. Otherwise the game will be harder to progress.
